Site Rules

Interacting with Members

TPW is a safe place for people to come and enjoy. There should be no abusive language, personal attacks, threats, or any other unkind behaviour.

Keep It Clean

You may not post any offensive content on TPW including your username, avatar, or personal description. You may not add any offensive comments, chat, or other content.

Privacy Policy

This policy covers how TPW treats personal information that it collects and receives.

Cookies & Targeting

Information about controlling the cookies that could be set by this web site can be found at this page.

Terms of Service

Services

TPW provides a collection of content, resources, tools, and technologies.

Registration

In consideration of your use of the Service, you represent that you are of legal age to form a binding contract.

Member Accounts

While many portions of the Service do not require registration, you may register as a user of TPW to enjoy greater access or privileges.

Content

All COVID-19 information on this site is for research purposes only and should not be relied upon.

Indemnity

You agree to indemnify and hold TPW harmless from any claim or demand.

Advertisers

TPW may place advertisements and promotions on the website or in emails sent to members.

Links

The Service may provide links to other sites or resources. TPW is not responsible for their availability or content.

Proprietary Rights

You agree not to modify, rent, lease, loan, sell, distribute or create derivative works based on the Service or the Software.

Trademark Information

All TPW trademarks and service marks are trademarks of TPW.

Copyright Policy

If you believe something on this Site has infringed your intellectual property rights, please notify us.

General Information

The Terms of Service constitutes the entire agreement between you and TPW.

Disclaimer Of Warranties

Your use of the service is at your sole risk. The service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis.

Limitation Of Liability

TPW shall not be liable to you for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages.

Exclusions And Limitations

Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion of certain warranties or the limitation or exclusion of liability.

Services
